column.name: ACCOUNT_NUMBER
column.comment: - This column contains a unique system defined identifier for the account.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: - This column contains the date the Account is effective. This date can be the current date or future dated.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: - data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: - This column is the logical foreign key to the associated Customer.

column.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_ID
column.comment: BANK_ACCOUNT_ID - This column is reference to the associated Bank Account.

column.name: CREDIT_CARD_ID
column.comment: CREDIT_CARD_ID - This column is the foreign key to the associated Credit Card.

column.name: DOCUMENT_PATTERN_ID
column.comment: DOCUMENT_PATTERN_ID - The identifier for the Invoice Pattern for the CBM interface.

column.name: METHOD_OF_PAYMENT_RD
column.comment: METHOD_OF_PAYMENT_RD - This column identifies the method of payment that will be used to pay for the charges to the account.

column.name: MANUAL_SUSPEND_INDICATOR
column.comment: MANUAL_SUSPEND_INDICATOR - This column defines if the suspension of an ACCOUNT must be done automatically or manually.

column.name: STATE_RD
column.comment: This column identifies the state of the ACCOUNT.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: -  This column contains data which is the state of the Account. This can  either be active or deact.

column.name: CURRENCY_RD
column.comment: -  The currency indicates the monetary unit in which invoices will be  produced.

column.name: CYCLE_NAME
column.comment: This is the name of the cycle associated to the mailing for the document pattern of the account related to the bill period at the time the bill period was created. -  This is the name of the Cycle associated with the Account.

column.name: DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE_NAME
column.comment: -  This data indicates which Document Template is used by CBM to  print Invoices for the Account.

column.name: LANGUAGE_RD
column.comment: -  This data identifies the language in which invoices are produced.

column.name: MAILING_ID
column.comment: MAILING_ID - This data is the foreign key to the Mailing associated with the  Account.

column.name: PAYMENT_TERM_RD
column.comment: PAYMENT_TERM_RD -  This column indicates the time the ACCOUNT owner has until their  payment must be received.

column.name: ZERO_CHARGE_INDICATOR
column.comment: ZERO_CHARGE_INDICATOR -  This data is a yes/no indicator specifying if Service  Subscriptions for which no usage has been generated  will appear on the Invoices. The default is that they will not appear  on the Invoices.

column.name: USAGE_LIMIT
column.comment: USAGE_LIMIT -  A monetary limit to the usage charges that may be accumulated for an  ACCOUNT.

column.name: STATE_DATE
column.comment: -  This is the date that the state of an Account changes.

column.name: CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID
column.comment: CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT_ID -  This column is the Customer defined, unique identifier for the  ACCOUNT that can be displayed on the invoice.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Description

column.name: DIRECT_DEBIT_AUTHORIZ_DATE
column.comment: DIRECT_DEBIT_AUTHORIZ_DATE -  This column indicates the date that Direct Debit may begin for the  ACCOUNT.

column.name: OUTPUT_DEVICE_RD
column.comment: OUTPUT_DEVICE_RD -  This column specifies the output device on which the document will  be distributed to the DOCUMENT RECIPIENT. The valid choices will be  provided through the CBM DOCUMENT TEMPLATE. Examples include Printer,  CD ROM, EDI, E mail, Fax, D

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: -  Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: -  Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: -  Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is  incremented on each update.  Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the  number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: - Flagging of entries according to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). "N" (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was valid some then in the past, "F" (future) - entity will be valid in the future.

column.name: TYPE_RD
column.comment: - The type of account

column.name: MANDATE_REFERENCE_ID
column.comment: New

column.name: MANDATE_SIGNATURE_DATE
column.comment: New

column.name: MANDATE_RECURRING_INDICATOR
column.comment: New, ´Y´: recurring, ´N´: One-Off

column.name: MANDATE_B2B_INDICATOR
column.comment: New

column.name: MANDATE_STATUS_RD
column.comment: New , values are ´CREATED´, ´ACTIVE´, ´FINISHED´

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
